entry.title: foam-extend在windows下编译
entry.content: foam-extend-4.0在windows上运行有两种方法1. 直接从官网下载已经编译好的windows版本按照foam-extend-4.0\doc\buildInstructions\Windows\READMEBinaryPackage.txt说明运行，该方法可以用自带求解器进行模拟。 2. 下载源码在windows进行编译并运行按照foam-extend-4.0\doc\buildInstructions\Windows\README.txt说明运行，但是该说明过于简单，一般很难一次编译成功。 foam-extend-4.0在windows10上编译流程1. 下载安装必须的编译工具及环境需要的必须的工具包包括：7-Zip、wget, CMake, Git, MinGW-w64, ParaView, PExports, Java,Subversion, Python。具体的下载地址如下：下载 密码：htb4注意事项（1）所有安装包不要安装在C盘Program Files等存在空格的路径下，建议新建programs文件夹，并安装在该文件夹下。（2）MSYS需要在Mingw下二次安装，只安装”mingw-developer-toolkit” 和 “msys-base”包。 2. 下载foam-extend-4.0安装包打开MingW的MSYS shell（MinGW\msys\1.0\msys.bat），下载foam-extend-4.0源文件，可以采用git工具：git clone -b nextRelease http://git.code.sf.net/p/foam-extend/foam-extend-3.2 foam-extend-4.0 下载后的目录在msys\1.0\home\username 3. Source安装环境打开MSYS shell，切换至foam-extend-4.0目录下，编辑etc\bashrc.mingw文件，保证里面的快捷方式制定已安装的各程序和环境安装路径下。Source环境变量，在MSYS shell（foam-extend-4.0目录）下，输入命令：. etc/bashrc.mingw如果输出结果有错误，请检查以上步骤。 输出结果一般如下： Setting environment variables for user-defined installed system tools and utilities ... Sourcing: /c/Users/UserName/Git/foam-extend-3.2/etc/bashrc Sourcing: /c/Users/UserName/Git/foam-extend-3.2/etc/prefs.sh.mingw Sourcing: /c/Users/UserName/Git/foam-extend-3.2/etc/settings.sh MESQUITE_DIR is initialized to: /c/Users/UserName/Git/foam-extend-3.2/ThirdParty/packages/mesquite-2.1.2 METIS_DIR is initialized to: /c/Users/UserName/Git/foam-extend-3.2/ThirdParty/packages/metis-5.1.0 PARMETIS_DIR is initialized to: /c/Users/UserName/Git/foam-extend-3.2/ThirdParty/packages/parmetis-4.0.3 PARMGRIDGEN_DIR is initialized to: /c/Users/UserName/Git/foam-extend-3.2/ThirdParty/packages/ParMGridGen-1.0 LIBCCMIO_DIR is initialized to: SCOTCH_DIR is initialized to: /c/Users/UserName/Git/foam-extend-3.2/ThirdParty/packages/scotch_6.0.0 SCOTCH_DIR is initialized to: /c/Users/UserName/Git/foam-extend-3.2/ThirdParty/packages/scotch_6.0.0 CMAKE_DIR is initialized to: M4_DIR is initialized to: BISON_DIR is initialized to: FLEX_DIR is initialized to: /C/MinGW/msys/1.0//bin/.. ZOLTAN_DIR is initialized to: PYTHON_DIR is initialized to: PYFOAM_DIR is initialized to: PYFOAM_SITE_DIR is initialized to: /c/Users/UserName/Git/foam-extend-3.2/ThirdParty/PyFoamSiteScripts HWLOC_DIR is initialized to: QT_DIR is initialized to: PARAVIEW_DIR is initialized to: LLVM_DIR is initialized to: MESA_DIR is initialized to: Sourcing: /c/Users/UserName/Git/foam-extend-3.2/etc/aliases.sh Adding user-defined installed system tools to PATH ... Setting OpenMPI environment settings ... Checking versions of installed system tools (based on PATH) ... 7-Zip: /c/Program Files/7-Zip/7z.exe [ 7-Zip [64] 9.20 Copyright (c) 1999-2010 Igor Pavlov 2010-11-18] Bison: /bin/bison.exe [bison (GNU Bison) 2.4.2] CMake: /c/Programs/cmake-3.2.3-win32-x86/bin/cmake.exe [cmake version 3.2.3] Flex: /bin/flex.exe [flex 2.5.35] G++: /c/Programs/mingw64/bin/g++.exe [g++.exe (x86_64-win32-seh-rev3, Built by MinGW-W64 project) 4.8.2] GCC: /c/Programs/mingw64/bin/gcc.exe [gcc.exe (x86_64-win32-seh-rev3, Built by MinGW-W64 project) 4.8.2] GMake: /c/Programs/strawberry-perl-5.20.2.1-64bit/c/bin/gmake.exe [GNU Make 4.0.90] Git: /c/Programs/Git/cmd/git.exe [git version 1.9.5.msysgit.1] Java: /c/ProgramData/Oracle/Java/javapath/java.exe [java version "1.8.0_45"] M4: /bin/m4.exe [m4 (GNU M4) 1.4.16] Make: /bin/make.exe [GNU Make 3.81] MinGW-w64: /c/Programs/mingw64 OpenMPI: /c/Programs/OpenMPI_v1.6.1-x64/bin/mpirun.exe [mpirun.exe (OpenRTE) 1.6.1] PEexports: /c/Programs/pexports-0.46/bin/pexports.exe [PExports 0.44 Copyright 1998, Anders Norlander] ParaView: /c/Programs/ParaView-4.3.1 Perl: /bin/perl.exe [ This is perl, v5.8.8 built for msys-64int] Python: /c/Programs/Python27/python.exe [Python 2.7.9] Subversion: /c/Programs/svn-win32-1.8.13/bin/svn.exe [svn, version 1.8.13 (r1667537)] Vim: /bin/vim.exe [VIM - Vi IMproved 7.3 (2010 Aug 15, compiled Mar 19 2011 15:37:04)] Wget: /c/Programs/wget-1.11.4-1/bin/wget.exe [GNU Wget 1.11.4 Copyright (C) 2008 Free Software Foundation, Inc.] FOAM_INST_DIR=/c/Users/UserName/Git WM_PROJECT_DIR=/c/Users/UserName/Git/foam-extend-3.2 WM_OSTYPE=MSWindows ENVIRONMENT SETUP COMPLETE. 4. 开始编译 如果输出的结果都没问题的话，开始编译，输入命令：Allwmake.mingw 编译过程会用时较长，请耐心等待。 注意事项（1）编译分为两步，首先是第三方必须安装包的编译，确保该编译过程正确是编译成功的前提。具体是否成功见foam-extend-4.0\ThirdParty\mingwBuild\build.log文件，正确的结果输出如下： Using MINGW_HOME=/e/Programs/mingw64 All stdout/stderr output is redirected to the directory /e/foam-extend-4.0/ThirdParty/mingwBuild/x64/output All builds occur in the directory /e/foam-extend-4.0/ThirdParty/mingwBuild/x64/build The script will install the completed builds in the directory /e/foam-extend-4.0/ThirdParty/mingwBuild/x64/install Removing previous builds ... Building libraries ... - Building dlfcn-win32-master ... - Building system ... - Building pthreads-w32-2-9-1-release ... - Building metis-5.1.0 ... - Building parmetis-4.0.3 ... - Building ParMGridGen-1.0 ... - Building scotch_6.0.4 ... - Building mesquite-2.1.2 ... All done! （2）第三方编译过程中有可能出现dlfcn-win32-master：no such file or directory等错误提示，请查看ThirdParty/mingwBuild/downloads文件夹中dlfcn-win32-master.zip是否下载完整。如出现该文件大小为0，可以考虑手动下载替换，重新编译。下载 （3）foam-extend源码编译过程中的日志文件为foam-extend-4.0\Allwmake.log，出现could not open file XXX.C for source file XXX.C，请忽略。 参考网址 https://www.cfd-online.com/Forums/openfoam-installation/157770-foam-windows-linux-mac.html By Shifeng 本文地址 http://yoursite.com/2018/04/06/OpenFOAM/foam-extend在windows-10下面的编译/

entry.title: ElastoPlasticBiotFoam求解器解析
entry.content: 基本介绍ElastoPlasticBiotFoam求解器是TANG TIAN完成其博士论文研究过程中编写的求解器，主要采用有限体积法进行饱和土的比奥固结问题分析。 其中土体本构采用理想塑性摩尔库伦本构模型。求解器的详细理论说明可参考TANG TIAN的论文：Tang, T., Hededal, O. and Cardiff, P., 2015. On finite volume method implementation of poro‐elasto‐plasticity soil model. International journal for numerical and analytical methods in geomechanics, 39(13), pp.1410-1430. 求解器代码代码下载 代码分析 求解器主程序 for (runTime++; !runTime.end(); runTime++) { Info<< "Time: " << runTime.timeName() << nl << endl; #include "readElastoPlasticBiotFoamControls.H" //读取求解器的控制参数 int iCorr = 0; //迭代次数 scalar initialResidual = GREAT; //迭代初始残差 lduMatrix::solverPerformance solverPerfP; lduMatrix::solverPerformance solverPerfDU; // gives an option for switching off the plasticity // solves the original poro-elastic Biot's equations word correct=word(runTime.controlDict().lookup("correctPlasticity")); //是否修正塑性 do { iCorr++; // store previous iteration, since later p will be under-relaxed p.storePrevIter(); //后期压力场放松使用 // solve the pore pressure equation 求解压力方程 fvScalarMatrix pEqn ( fvm::ddt(p) == fvm::laplacian(Dp, p) - fvc::div(fvc::ddt(Dp2,U)) ); solverPerfP = pEqn.solve(); p.relax();//压力场放松 dp = p - p.oldTime();//更新孔压增量 dp.correctBoundaryConditions();//因孔压属于方程求解量，更新孔压增量边界值 // store previous iteration, since later dU will be under-relaxed dU.storePrevIter();//后期位移增量场放松使用 // calculate the explicit part of div stress # include "calculateDivDsigmaExp.H"//显示计算应力相关项 // solve the momentum (soil skeleton displacement) equation with // 'lagged' pressure coupling, plasticity and cross-component coupling fvVectorMatrix dUEqn ( fvm::laplacian(2.0*mu + lambda, dU, "laplacian(dU)") == - divDsigmaExp + fvc::div(2.0*mu*(mesh.Sf() & fvc::interpolate(dEpsP))) + fvc::div(lambda*(mesh.Sf() & I*fvc::interpolate(tr(dEpsP)))) + fvc::grad(dp) ); solverPerfDU = dUEqn.solve(); dU.relax(); //位移场放松 gradDU = fvc::grad(dU);//更新位移梯度 // update stress and plastic strains if plasticity option is switched on if (correct=="yes") { # include "correctPlasticity.H" //修正塑性，此处采用的是摩尔库伦模型 } initialResidual = max(solverPerfP.initialResidual(),solverPerfDU.initialResidual()); U = U.oldTime()+dU; U.correctBoundaryConditions(); if (iCorr % 10 == 1){ Info << "\tTime " << runTime.value() << ", Corrector " << iCorr << ", Solving for " << dU.name() << ", residual = " << initialResidual << endl; } } while (initialResidual > convergenceTolerance && iCorr < nCorr); //收敛精度判断，满足，下一时间步，不满足，下一迭代步 其中主要涉及两个方程的求解，一是孔压方程的求解，二是位移增量方程的求解。孔压方程的求解部分相对简单易懂，位移增量方程的求解部分相对难懂，需要结合论文熟悉其理论知识，包括为优化收敛性所做的左右laplacian项平衡处理，以及塑性修正部分的理论（难点在于找到合适的应力积分算法）。 By Shifeng 本文地址 http://yoursite.com/2017/12/27/OpenFOAM/ElastoPlasticBiotFoam求解器解析/

entry.title: OpenFOAM固体力学模块学习资料
entry.content: OpenFOAM固体力学模块学习资料 OpenFOAM因其强大的方程求解功能，现在已逐渐被应用于固体力学的求解中，特别是流固相互作用的研究（海上风电基础受力、水压破裂等）。 现阶段针对固体力学的求解，主要是爱尔兰都柏林大学的Philip Cardiff作了大量的工作，其很多成果已嵌入至OpenFOAM EXTEND版本中。 CFD论坛OpenFOAM固体力学模块https://www.cfd-online.com/Forums/openfoam/126706-support-thread-solid-mechanics-solvers-added-openfoam-extend.html 流固耦合求解器https://github.com/wyldckat/FluidStructureInteractionhttp://openfoamwiki.net/index.php/Extend-bazaar/Toolkits/Fluid-structure_interaction 唐甜土体BIOT固结求解器https://bitbucket.org/tiantang/minigeotechfoam/src/defdcd6abf32b7a77d5d5a0cf27d0d3270ab84d9?at=master Hisham Elsafti编写的geotechFoam求解器https://bitbucket.org/HishamElSafti/geotechfoam Philip Cardiff 编写的solid4Foam模块https://bitbucket.org/philip_cardiff/solids4foam 本文地址 http://yoursite.com/2017/12/24/OpenFOAM/OpenFOAM固体力学模块学习资料/

entry.title: 离散元软件学习常用网址
entry.content: 离散元开源软件学习常用学习网址1 Esys-Particle相关链接：https://launchpad.net/https://launchpad.net/esys-particlehttp://esys.geocomp.uq.edu.au/esys-particle_python_doc/current/pythonapi/html/index.htmlhttps://launchpad.net/esys-particle/+announcements 2 yade相关链接 https://yade-dem.org/ 比较 yade的优势比paticle多：计算快，开发团队强大 本文地址 http://yoursite.com/2017/05/15/DEM/离散元软件学习常用网址/

entry.title: OpenFOAM常用网址
entry.content: openfoam常用学习网址软件地址：官网地址：http://www.openfoam.org/extend版本地址：http://www.extend-project.de/openfoam wiki相关说明，修改信息：http://openfoamwiki.net/index.php/Main_Page 论坛学习：东岳流体：http://www.dyfluid.com/index.html#introopenfoam论坛：http://www.cfd-online.com/Forums/openfoam/openfoam workshop：http://openfoamworkshop.org/CFD Direct：http://cfd.direct/openfoam/user-guide/ 博客知乎：苏军伟博客：http://blog.sina.com.cn/openfoamresearch王洋博客：http://blog.sina.com.cn/multiphyzks乐天树的博客：http://blog.sina.com.cn/s/blog_4a0a8b5d0100v2zv.html知乎学习：https://www.zhihu.com/question/27185834?rf=27813194永无止境博客：http://openfoam.blog.sohu.com/entry/#entry哈士奇爱喝酒的博客：http://blog.sina.com.cn/s/articlelist_2696159261_8_1.html邱小平的博客：http://xiaopingqiu.github.io/ 学习资料：JASAK博士论文：https://link.zhihu.com/?target=http%3A//powerlab.fsb.hr/ped/kturbo/OpenFOAM/docs/HrvojeJasakPhD.pdfChalmers大学openfoam博士课程：http://www.tfd.chalmers.se/~hani/kurser/OS_CFD/UNIGE Introductory OpenFOAM course-training: http://www.dicat.unige.it/guerrero/OpenFOAM_course2015b.html 其他：101 Things to read when starting with OpenFOAM：http://www.sourceflux.de/blog/101-things-read-starting-openfoam/openfoam history: http://www.openfoam.com/download/openfoam-history.php 本文地址 http://yoursite.com/2017/05/15/OpenFOAM/OpenFOAM常用网址/
